data.headline: Junior UX Designer and Academic Researcher
data.summary: Passionate and detail-oriented UX Designer with a strong academic background in human-computer interaction and user research. Experienced in conducting user studies, designing intuitive interfaces, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative digital solutions. Committed to staying up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in the field of UX design.

experience.title: UX Designer Intern
bullets: Conducted user research and interviews to gather insights into user needs and pain points
Collaborated with the design team to create low-fidelity wireframes and high-fidelity prototypes
Performed usability testing and analyzed feedback to iteratively improve the design
Presented design concepts and recommendations to stakeholders

experience.title: Research Assistant
bullets: Assisted in the design and execution of user studies focused on improving the user experience of educational technology
Collaborated with professors and researchers to analyze data and generate insights
Contributed to the preparation of research papers and presentations

experience.title: UX Design Intern
bullets: Participated in the design and development of a mobile application for a local startup
Conducted user interviews and usability testing to identify areas for improvement
Created wireframes, mockups, and interactive prototypes using Figma

projects.name: Accessibility Research Project
projects.description: Conducted a study on the accessibility challenges faced by individuals with visual impairments when using mobile applications. Developed design guidelines and prototypes to improve the user experience.

projects.name: Sustainable UX Design
projects.description: Explored the integration of sustainable design principles into the UX design process. Designed a mobile app that encourages environmentally-friendly behaviors.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Alejandra Martínez, a young woman with long, dark hair, wearing a blue blouse and smiling at the camera.
